description:
The final first round match of the ABC Cup begins between Noboru and Shido. And facing a difficult choice, Noboru gets some helpful advice from his Buddy El Quixote. Meanwhile Doai goes looking for Genma and finds more than he bargained for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kedakaki Kokoro! Ryuukishi to Tomo ni!!
Noble Heart! Together with the Dragon Knight!
気高き心! 竜騎士と共に!!
